Name: Dinning Room
Text: You enter the dinning room. A long marble table runs the length of the decorated chamber. Carved wooden chairs sorround the table on both sides.

Name: Dinning Room2
Text: Dinning room, now what do you do?

Name: Treasure room
Text: The door opens to reveal a treasure room. A large iron chest is chained to the floor. A heavy lock seals the chest. As you examine the lock the shadows around you form into a fiend made of black. 'WHERE IS MY RING?!!' he shrieks loudly.

Name: Shadow conversation1
Text: Yes it is I! What of it?
Transitions: What do you know of mistress?
Why are you guarding this chest?

Name: Shadow conversation2
Text: What else do you ask the shadow?
Transitions: What do you know of mistress?
Why are you guarding this chest?

Name: Shadow conversation3
Text: YES! YES! This is the one! I must have it! GIVE IT TO ME!
Transitions: Can i have whatever is in the chest then?

Name: Shadow fight
Text: What weapon will you use to dispatch this fiend?

Name: Shadow defeated
Text: The fiend is now gone. Nothing else to do here.
